name: Iced Widow
description: This powerful indica combines the high THC content of ICE with the prized White Widow.  Iced Widow's compact stature and quick flowering time have made this strain popular among growers of any experience level, while the potency and diesel flavors demand attention from the hardest hitting indica fans. The strong and long-lasting effects make it an ideal solution when combatting chronic pain.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Happy, Talkative, Hungry, Giggly, Lack of Appetite, Stress, Pain, Insomnia, Depression, Dry Mouth, Anxious, Dry Eyes
